thread.section_title: macs4u.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of macs4u.com | www.macs4u.com
thread.title: Jon

author: Jon
title: Jon
text:
I was a little hesitant about ordering a computer from an online company who I have not had prior dealings with. However, I was pleasantly surprised when my computer arrived in perfect condition. I honestly had a hard time believing that this computer had been refurbished-It looked brand new. I called the company regarding questions and concerns I had regarding the purchase which were all professionally answered by knowledgeable staff. I have and would recommend Macs4U to anyone looking for a Mac-especially at half the price of a new one.
Thanks again.
